tool_description: This API endpoint allows you to convert a given string into its SHA-1 hash representation. The server takes the input string from the request body, processes it, and responds with the SHA-1 hash as a JSON object.  To use this API, send a POST request to the /convert endpoint with a JSON body containing the "string" field with the string you want to convert. The response will contain the SHA-1 hash of the input string.  SHA-1 (Secure Hash Algorithm 1) is a cryptographic hash function commonly ...
name: string to sha-1
title: string to sha-1

api_list.name: getSha1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://string-to-sha-1.p.rapidapi.com/api/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "string-to-sha-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
